turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hi there becky i need your help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you order a pizza from me from westside express?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yeah of course the one on the eastside sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes the east location

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i want two large pepperoni pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay two large pepperoni pizzas

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and that bread that i like, what is it called

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the crazy bread?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes the crazy bread.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay what else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i want a pound of chicken wings

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what flavor do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: let's do lemon parmeson

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and ranch with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so that is two pepperoni large pizzas with lemon pepper wings and crazy bread

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that is exactly what i want

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay the receipt is going to your phone as a text and it'll be ready for pickup

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: when do i pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you bye bye
